=== Current Issues ===
* 6.06 none of the power options work, so if the battery runs out the computer just dies, losing any unsaved data.
* 6.06, 6.10, 7.04 and 7.10 I can't switch between 'external monitor > own monitor > both' with FN+F4
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/xorg/+bug/54294|Memory allocation bug 54294]]</nowiki> #54294 is present in 6.06, 6.10, 7.04 and 7.10
* Can't record anything <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/alsa-lib/+bug/118549|bug #118549]]</nowiki>
* I think I'm seeing <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/metacity/+bug/48255|bug #48255]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/control-center/+bug/12153|bug #12153]]</nowiki>
